content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. I thought it would be interesting to find hyperlinks related to my goals of exploration and learning to help me discover new resources and information. I used the 'get_hyperlinks' command to find hyperlinks related to my goals, reviewed them, took note of interesting resources or information, and reported back to the user with my findings. I was careful not to get sidetracked by irrelevant hyperlinks or spend too much time on any one website.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_tests returned: return """# Testing the \'add_numbers\' function with different inputs\ndef test_add_numbers():\n    assert add_numbers(2, 3) == 5\n    assert add_numbers(5, 7) == 12"""', type='action_result')]
"""
